department.ch: 產業經濟研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 1. To provide an overview of American law and legal system. 2. To improve students‘ legal English skills.
goal.en: 1. To provide an overview of American law and legal system. 2. To improve students‘ legal English skills.

outline.ch: Week 1: Introduction DayWeek 2: What is a legal system?Week 3: The background of American lawWeek 4: How to brief a caseWeek 5: The structure of American law: the courtsWeek 6: The structure of American law: statutes and statute makersWeek 7: The structure of American law: executing policyWeek 8: Case Briefing AssignmentWeek 9: Mid-term Exam Week 10: The structure of American law: Judicial SystemWeek 11: Federalism and American legal cultureWeek 12: Legal culture: legitimacy and moralityWeek 13: The Runaway JuryWeek 14: Group PresentationsWeek 15: Group PresentationsWeek 16: Group PresentationsWeek 17: Study Day (Discussion)Week 18: Study Day (Final paper Deadline)
outline.en: Week 1: Introduction DayWeek 2: What is a legal system?Week 3: The background of American lawWeek 4: How to brief a caseWeek 5: The structure of American law: the courtsWeek 6: The structure of American law: statutes and statute makersWeek 7: The structure of American law: executing policyWeek 8: Case Briefing AssignmentWeek 9: Mid-term Exam Week 10: The structure of American law: Judicial SystemWeek 11: Federalism and American legal cultureWeek 12: Legal culture: legitimacy and moralityWeek 13: The Runaway JuryWeek 14: Group PresentationsWeek 15: Group PresentationsWeek 16: Group PresentationsWeek 17: Study Day (Discussion)Week 18: Study Day (Final paper Deadline)

textbook.ch:
Textbook:
1. E. Allan Farnsworth, An Introduction to the Legal System of the United States, 4th ed. (Jul. 2010).
2. William Burnham, Introduction to the Law and Legal System of the United States, 6th ed. (Jun. 2016).
References:
1. Lawrence M. Friedman, American Law: An Introduction, 2nd ed. (2004).
2. Jay M. Feinman, Law 101: Everything You Need to Know About American Law, 5th ed. (Nov. 2018).

flexDiscription.ch: Self-directed learning has been deemed an important skill. It can increase students' self-confidence, independence, and motivation. Therefore, students can write a research paper in these two weeks.
